item.description:
Doing Your Due Diligence:

How to Cover Your Assets


Presented by David Carney, Attorney and Ina Cohen, REALTOR

David Carney has over 11 years experience in real estate conveyance, specializing in residential property closures. Complimenting his decorated career as a lawyer, which includes employment at two highly touted real estate law firms, managing a satellite branch, and serving as a loan originator during his one-year interim between college and law school, David has distinguished himself as a premiere leader in New England in residential title closings.

Ina  Cohen has over 7 years experience as a REALTOR, broker and rental specialist. She is a member of the Greater Boston Association of REALTORS, Massachusetts Association of REALTORS and the National Association of REALTORS,  and is a Certified Buyers Representative, Certified Residential Specialist, and Certified Distressed Property Expert.

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 PM, Thursday, May 17, 2012

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers and meetup members

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association
